description: Retrieves a batch of Records from a FeatureGroup.

parameters.name: Identifiers
parameters.description: A list containing the name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the FeatureGroup, the list of names of Feature``s to be retrieved, and the corresponding ``RecordIdentifier values as strings. (dict) --- The identifier that identifies the batch of Records you are retrieving in a batch. The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the FeatureGroup containing the records you are retrieving in a batch. The value for a list of record identifiers in string format. (string) --- FeatureNames (list) --- List of names of Features to be retrieved. If not specified, the latest value for all the Features are returned. (string) ---

nested_params.name: FeatureGroupName
nested_params.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the FeatureGroup containing the records you are retrieving in a batch.

nested_params.name: RecordIdentifiersValueAsString
nested_params.description: The value for a list of record identifiers in string format.

nested_params.name: FeatureNames
nested_params.description: List of names of Features to be retrieved. If not specified, the latest value for all the Features are returned.

nested_items.name: Records
nested_items.description: A list of Records you requested to be retrieved in batch.

nested_items.name: FeatureGroupName
nested_items.description: The FeatureGroupName containing Records you retrieved in a batch.

nested_items.name: RecordIdentifierValueAsString
nested_items.description: The value of the record identifier in string format.

nested_items.name: Record
nested_items.description: The Record retrieved.

nested_items.name: FeatureName
nested_items.description: The name of a feature that a feature value corresponds to.

nested_items.name: ValueAsString
nested_items.description: The value in string format associated with a feature. Used when your CollectionType is None. Note that features types can be String, Integral, or Fractional. This value represents all three types as a string.

nested_items.name: ValueAsStringList
nested_items.description: The list of values in string format associated with a feature. Used when your CollectionType is a List, Set, or Vector. Note that features types can be String, Integral, or Fractional. These values represents all three types as a string.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ExpiresAt
nested_items.description: The ExpiresAt ISO string of the requested record.

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: A list of errors that have occurred when retrieving a batch of Records.

nested_items.name: FeatureGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the feature group that the record belongs to.

nested_items.name: RecordIdentifierValueAsString
nested_items.description: The value for the RecordIdentifier in string format of a Record from a FeatureGroup that is causing an error when attempting to be retrieved.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code of an error that has occurred when attempting to retrieve a batch of Records. For more information on errors, see Errors.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message of an error that has occurred when attempting to retrieve a record in the batch.

nested_items.name: UnprocessedIdentifiers
nested_items.description: A unprocessed list of FeatureGroup names, with their corresponding RecordIdentifier value, and Feature name.

nested_items.name: FeatureGroupName
nested_items.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the FeatureGroup containing the records you are retrieving in a batch.

nested_items.name: RecordIdentifiersValueAsString
nested_items.description: The value for a list of record identifiers in string format.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: FeatureNames
nested_items.description: List of names of Features to be retrieved. If not specified, the latest value for all the Features are returned.
(string) ---
